title: Video replay: Bills, Bengals highlights
text:
Video replay: Bills, Bengals highlights Democrat and Chronicle 4:32 p.m. EDT October 18, 2015 Buy Photo EJ Manuel throws in the first quarter against the Cincinnati Bengals. (Photo: Jamie Germano/staff photographer) Buy Photo 65 CONNECT 12 TWEET LINKEDIN 2 COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
Buffalo Bills quarterback EJ Manuel started and started fast. 
It was the rest of the game that was bumpy. 
Buffalo lost to the Cincinnati Bengals 34-21 on Sunday. 
Cincinnati quarterback Andy Dalton completed 22 of 33 passes for 243 yards and three touchdowns. 
Watch the game's touchdowns below: 
EJ Manuel 2-yard run. Bills EJ Manuel runs for 2-yard TD 
Jeremy Hill 13-yard pass from Andy Dalton. Watch Jeremy Hill make the catchWatch him break 2 tackles.Watch him front flip into the end zone. Oh my #CINvsBUF http://t.co/ELxTfQAkIF — NFL (@NFL) October 18, 2015 
Giovani Bernard 17-yard run. He wasn't launched out of a cannon.It just looks like it.Gio Bernard --> to the house --> Untouched. #CINvsBUF http://t.co/30zln5Yn2H 
Sammy Watkins 22-yard pass from Sammy Watkins. . @sammywatkins finally scores a TD and gets hurt. #Bills can't win. #BillsMafia pic.twitter.com/4iuBHyt69v — Chetan Rakieten (@chetanrakieten) October 18, 2015 
Marvin Jones 10-yard pass from Andy Dalton. Marvin Jones is no stranger to acrobatics.But this one-handed forward dive TD?? No words.Just no words. #CINvsBUF http://t.co/c0zE0iLyYL 
Tyler Eifert 4-yard pass from Andy Dalton #Bengals take 31-14 lead on Tyler Eifert TD reception with 1:42 remaining in the third. https://t.co/y2EHjYgNlh — Josh Kirkendall (@Josh_Kirkendall) October 18, 2015 
LeSean McCoy 4-yard run
